messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Hold it right there, citizen!
Walking around at night is unsafe!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
You’ve got tough partners with you.
Carry on, citizen. Carry on.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Out so late? Does your mother
know you’re out so late?
messages.TRMSG_NOT_NIGHT_UNUSED:
Well, hello there!That’s very civil minded of you to
say hello to your local Policeman!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Didn’t I already give you a warning?
It’s unsafe to walk around at night!
